property.name: variant
property.label: Display Option
property.description: Select the default format of the card. Options are: None (flat) or Featured (drop shadow), Outline (flat with border).

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record Id
property.description: Set to {!recordId} to pass the page's record Id.

property.name: listId
property.label: List Id
property.description: Unique ID for the list results. Allows multiple list components to exist on a page. This property relates the filter component to a specific list.
